text:
Without signing in it should be possible to:
You can do quite a lot on deepl.com without ever logging in:
Translate up to ~1,500 characters at a time
Paste any text, pick source & target languages, get the translation instantlyâ€”no account required.
Swap languages with one click
Use the double-arrow button to reverse source/target and re-translate immediately.
Listen to the translation
Hit the speaker icon to hear the translated text spoken aloud (where TTS is available).
Copy the result
One-click copy button next to the translated text.
Use the dictionary/alternative wording
Click any word in the translation to see synonyms, shorter phrases, or alternative choices.
